bioghist.p: Anna Caroline Jaudon (1824-1912) was the daughter of William Latta Jaudon and Susan Gibson Lea Jaudon. In 1850, she married Henry Charles Lea (1825-1909), the son of Isaac Lea. Henry Charles Lea was an historian of the European middle ages who wrote extensively on the institutional and legal history of the Catholic Church. there is much more information on Henry Charles Lea at UPenn's special collections website] note: Henry Charles Lea's library and manuscript collection were given to UPenn, and there is a Henry Charles Lea Library there that forms part of UPenn's special collections.
